definitions.definition: A short report , especially one released through official channels to be immediately broadcast or publicized .
A time-sensitive news item or short news report .
A short printed publication , especially one produced regularly by an organization .

main_definition: A short report , especially one released through official channels to be immediately broadcast or publicized .
secondary_definitions: A time-sensitive news item or short news report .
A short printed publication , especially one produced regularly by an organization .
